website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for its solid construction. This is a great option once you get past the “heavy fumes” period.
pros: Clear and easy installation, with a help line just in case you get stuck
Wood and stainless steel also available instead of granite for a top surface
cons: Takes a good 2-3 hours to put together
having a second person to help is recommended
Strong fumes right out of the box will last for a couple of days

customer_reviews.title: Works if you replace provided hardware
customer_reviews.text: Follow-up: This is a very nice piece except for the hardware. Turns-out, if you replaced the furniture cam locks provided, which are cheap junk, with "uxcell 14.6mm 0.575" Dia Furniture Connecting Cam Fittings New" on Amazon, it assembles into a rock-solid cabinet. Too bad the manufacturer din't do that the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen island was a perfect fit for our newly remodeled kitchen. It came in two boxes and each were packed perfectly. I built it in just over 2 hours due to a few changes I made for this island to fit our needs. I left the wheels off and mounted this island to my existing counter. Also , we left the towel bar off as to mount the island directly to our counter. We are not using this product as an island, but as an extension to our existing counter.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love the height as I am 6-1 and I have a hard time bending due to back issues. I dislike the fact that it’s not the best stainless steel but for the money come on! The wheel locks should be on all four wheels. And the instructions should be a bit more clear. Also whoever pre-drilled needs to never do it again and loos their position. I had to drill a few holes to make this work. Overall it’s a good product I would order again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Jones

customer_reviews.title: Rolling Kitchen Island
customer_reviews.text: The first order received was the wrong color and had to be returned for the correct color. Mounting the base was very difficult on mine. After hours of trying and unable to make the bolt connect to the nut, I noticed the counter sink holes were not deep enough. After drilling the counter sink holes deeper, the bolts were able to connect with the nuts. Both boxes were damage during shipping, but the island and granite top were wrapped very well and were not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: very nice and well made center island
customer_reviews.text: It looks great,and was very well made and packaged.the granite top came in a seperate box covered in styrofoam and had a wooden frame around it to ensure it would arrive safe. only advice is dedicate a day to building this. i am handy and used a drill(low torque setting) and it still took me 4.5-5hrs to build. my advice if you use a drill to save time definetly be careful and use it very low torque,but it saved alot of time and looks and works great. much needed added counter and cabinet space.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Black Granite Top Kitchen Island
customer_reviews.text: My new kitchen island was assembled today, and I love it! Assembly wasn't difficult like some reviews made it out to be. It was time consuming, but if you follow the directions it goes together fine. The island is constructed of real wood, not particleboard. There are dowels to help hold corners together since it's mobile. I do suggest, though, that you track the packages. That way you can have freshly baked cookies to entice the deliveryman into helping you get those two 100# boxes into your house. My packages sat in the garage for a couple of days. All in all, a fantastic purchase well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: MoreLoveLessHate

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre at best
customer_reviews.text: This was a pain in the rear to put together and it isn’t truly white. In the pictures of other reviews it looked white. But alas it’s more of a dingy off white. It looks like it was white and was in a house with a chain smoker and stained that yellowish color. Also there was a huge dark spot on the granite counter top. I added a picture so you can see the difference in color and the spot on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to your kitchen area or as a remote bar
customer_reviews.text: The island is a nice addition to your kitchen or use as a mini bar. The stainless top is nice but a thin look as to a counter top type thickness and scratches and dents easily. Mine actually came with a dent in it and it's wavy because of the thickness of the material. The grommets that hold it together are cheap but work and you have to get the feel for the grommet when you twist them while assembling or they break. The good thing is it comes with a couple extra and there are some aftermarket ones I seen in reviews and wish I had bought them before assembly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cooney

customer_reviews.title: I think it's a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and well packaged. Took a few hours to put together by myself, but not difficult. Is exactly like the description. I read all the reviews and decided to get the wood top as it seemed to have less issues than the other types. It's easy to move and it does lock into place. Would be nicer if all 4 wheels had locking casters, but it works out ok. I really like it and it fits perfectly in a space where my kitchen needed counterspace.
customer_reviews.author: Heather T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice kitchen island
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this island with one exception. It was relatively easy to assemble and seems study with good storage. My one con is the stainless steel top. The slightest touch will leave marks that are not easily wiped off. I have to use stainless steel cleaner/polish to get even one fingerprint off AND have to do the entire top for it to blend in with the rest of the top. Overall, I would like this island and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed..I had broken parts waiting for a reply from the place ..
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Helton

customer_reviews.title: Drawers are really short!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way this looks and the overall exterior size but the drawers (the original reason I bought this for my workplace) are much shorter than the depth of the cabinet. Why would they build this like that? I had to turn the silverware holder sideways to fit it in the drawer and there's not enough room for the serving pieces. Not only that but the face of the drawer is much taller than the interior. It's nice to look at and sort of affordable but I'm disappointed in the amount of storage available.
customer_reviews.author: Tamale

customer_reviews.title: The stainless steel top scratches very easy and looks horrible
customer_reviews.text: Only had a few weeks. The stainless steel top scratches very easy and looks horrible. The cabinet base is a perfect match to my kitchen cabinets. East to assemble but need to be patient. Few minor damaged parts but called customer service who were very helpful and they mailed out replacement parts right away. I recommend it but would order the one with the granite top
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but very functional and it looks good
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect but very functional and it looks good. With the marble top, this unit is somewhat top heavy so I could imagine having problems if it were moved around a lot. In my case, it is sitting in a corner against a wall supporting a microwave so it is sturdy enough for that purpose. The only thing that I didn't like was that the paint they used reeked of an organic smell. I kept it open for a few days after assembly with a fan blowing on it. It took a couple of months for the odor to go away.
customer_reviews.author: pierop

customer_reviews.title: Minor damage but visually pleasing and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen island looks great in my kitchen. It took several hours to assemble however my husband was able to do it on his own. The directions could have been more clear. There was minor damage to a few pieces but not severe enough to return. This has been up in my kitchen for several months now and its still very sturdy. It gives just the right amount of extra storage space that we needed in the kitchen at a fraction of the price compared to adding new cabinets. Overall 4 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Most of the parts are particle board. Wood finish is very thin, so slightest scratch reveals the pale particle board underneath. Similar to IKEA quality but more difficult assembly. Has Prop. 65 warning so feel some concern about using in kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Aardvark8

customer_reviews.title: Way too good for the room it is in.
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful. It is so much more beautiful that my kitchen. Takes a while to assemble, but at least some of the smaller parts (drawer rollers, etc.) were already included. I assembled it by myself, although if you cannot lift heavy objects, I suggest asking for help. Even the back is pretty! Directions were clear, even with referring to part diagrams. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: artcat742

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but compliments
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I put together this cart in a few hours. Everyone who see it compliments how nice it is. The granite is gorgeous. The only draw back are the drawers. I cannot find a silver ware holder that will fit such a small draw. Had to use plastic mini bins from the 99 cent store. Needless to say, not aesthetically pleasing but it is behind a closed draw. Would have given 5 starts if the draws were an inch larger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too cheap, poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Particle board had serious quality control issues. Cracks/splits were glued back together, and one piece split while I was gently screwing in the cam screw. The metal top option is almost like someone wrapped aluminum foil around a wood surface. The casters are complete crap, and one won't lock at all. I don't think it's worth the price. You're better off spending more on something better quality of you want it to survive your next move.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Great product, instructions could be better but get the job done
customer_reviews.text: We love this kitchen cart. Once assembled it is solid and looks great. The shipper broke something on an interior drawer piece I easily fixed with wood glue, but that isn't the product's fault as there was a huge dent/damage in the box. The only problem is with the instructions - nothing about how to open the indestructible granite top packaging,and it tells you to open it in step one when you don't need it until later. Assemble took a long time but was easy for anyone who has assembled furniture in the past. A good choice for a kitchen cart.
customer_reviews.author: P. P.

customer_reviews.title: For How Much It Cost, I Expected Better
customer_reviews.text: Starts out looking very nice immediately out of the packaging. Then, when we looked at the pieces individually, about half were damaged enough that they needed replaced. We'll be returning those pieces and I'll raise the stars if the company is easy to work with and replaces the parts because otherwise it seems like it could be a nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE LOVE LOVE this island. It came super fast in the mail. It wasn't extremely hard to put together but make sure you have some time to do it. I added pictures because it's beautiful and fit my kitchen perfectly. It's actually bigger than I originally thought but that works for me, I love the extra space. Pretty good quality too. Wood top classy, sturdy and so worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great island
customer_reviews.text: It took my girlfriend about 3 hours to put this beast together and it has really made our kitchen so much better. I wish the drawers we longer and the storage was bigger, but this island is beautiful and it didn't break the bank, it more put a crack in it. For the price, I wish it was better, but for what it's doing it satisfies.
customer_reviews.author: Braillynn

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece
customer_reviews.text: This piece was a great purchase. It is easy to put together and makes a great addition to kitchens in need of counter and storage space. The mani reason I am unable to give 5 stars...the inside smells terribly of wood stain. I cleaned it multiple times before putting my kitchen items inside, but now my pans and potholders smell, too! Other than that, I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: lkrebs01

customer_reviews.title: Makes My KiKitchen Easier to Work In
customer_reviews.text: This really helped add counter and cabinet space in my tiny kitchen. It rolls easily, has brakes to lock it in place. I am not good at assembling things, so someone else helped me, and found it fairly simple to put together. The only reason that I did not give this 5 stars is because I am not crazy about the top of the counter. It looks resembles butcher block, but isn't. However, I knew that when I purchased it. I bought this one because it was a whole lot less expensive than the same cart with a granite or real butcher block top.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S

customer_reviews.title: Granite is stained black and it comes off!!
customer_reviews.text: Cabinet is okay. The black granite top is gray granite that is stained black where visible and if you put this against a wall, the black stain will come off onto your wall. Quality is okay and assembly was relatively easy. Not worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Scavone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We received the first in a damaged box, returned immediately. Received the replacement a short week after the first one...it was perfect, no broken, dented, scratched, discolored. Everything as should be. Went together well (does take two people). Just what we have been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: rsb

customer_reviews.title: Drawers were broken.
customer_reviews.text: The two drawer fronts each have two blocks of wood on the inside onto which the sides of the drawers are to be attached. One of the pieces of wood was completely broken off on arrival, and the other three are so loose, they practically fall off just touching them. I suppose they could be glued back on with some strong wood glue, but one should not have to do that considering the cost of the cabinet. Otherwise it's a nice cabinet and I had no other problems with the wood or stainless steel top being dented as other reviewers had. I had also purchased the smaller matching cabinet and that went together beautifully and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost a 5
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, I would have given this 5 stars but the hardware is subpar and there is just not enough real wood used. Also I had to reinforce the paper towel holder. It was not secured very good with what was supplied. I drilled pilot holes first then used 2in wood screws. That worked. I also purchased different casters, 4in all black vinyl designer all locking casters. Very nice finish and the black granite top is flawless!!! It looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cuda

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction.
customer_reviews.text: All the pre-drilled holes are too big The connectors fall out as try to connect some of the parts together The bolts that hold the towel rack and the paper towel holder won't tighten because metal threads in the holes are too loose so you can't tighten them. And the hazard warning labels are large and glued to the outside of the cart . you can't peel them off without removing some of the paint. On the good side the wheels and granite top are very good .
customer_reviews.author: James A. Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in March 2019 and it is now December 2019 and the door on one side completely broke apart around the bottom after just a few months of regular use, and now the door just falls off. I am SO disappointed, because this piece otherwise seemed very sturdy and well-made. But now, after spending $400 - I'm once again looking for an island for my kitchen less than a year after purchasing this one. Very unhappy with how poorly this held up to normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Emily A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We used this to hold salon products and as a work bench for salon work, very sturdy, good capacity, looks great, and is working out a lot better than the cheap one we started with. Couldn't be happier, was able to modify a little bit for what we are using it for.
customer_reviews.author: Superman

customer_reviews.title: If I can do it ANYONE can!!
customer_reviews.text: We are using this for a bar unit in our dining room. I'm 77 years old and I completed this project very quickly and successfully. The instructions were thorough and easy to follow and it was kind of fun doing it myself. The only help I needed was my husband and son lifted the granite top onto the unit. If I can do this anyone can!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES E SHELTON

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This island is perfect foe my needs. The shipping/packaging could use some improvement. The drawers were broken and I had to do some modifications to fully assemble. Once fully assembled it is the perfect kitchen island. The drawers are a little smaller than desired as I wanted to use it for my silverware but I settled for "junk" drawers instead. I recommend putting one locking wheel on each small sick so when it's in place one side won't move once in place.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I could have had this custom made for twice as much, with solid wood, but this is next best. Looks great and matches our cherry wood cabinets and tables well. A few dislikes - the big stickers on the outer side of a top panel needs careful removal - wish they put the sticker on the inner where it won't be seen. The other was laminate was peeling off on another piece. As for Customer support I'm getting both pieces provided for free by them. I would give 5 stars to their customer support - live chat.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T.

customer_reviews.title: If there weren’t flaws in the pieces I would be happier but I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it looks pretty good and it was easy to put together. However in the pictures I posted there were a lot of flaws in the pieces. Chips in paint, smear or when I screwed in a wheel the wood split. I’m relatively happy with it but if I would have known there were flaws I wouldn’t have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT SOLID WOOD - particle board
customer_reviews.text: Although site says this is wood, it is particle board. They affix several large labels to back of unit. Since we use it as a peninsula (thus the wheels) the labels were very unsightly. When removing the labels, the paint came off with them. I'm very unhappy. Now, ever if we "touch up" it will show through. Door hinges cause a dead space on hinge side of door so storage space is less that width of shelf. Do like the cart, just wish it was better quality and as advertised. Assembly was a PIA..
customer_reviews.author: L H Clements

customer_reviews.title: Great storage
customer_reviews.text: It took my husband and I a few hours to assemble. It's a great cart but I wish it was a bit more sturdy. After a week the handle side has become very loose and looks like it will fall apart. The way it's built, you can't go in and tighten it. I guess it's just a matter of time. I love the way it looks and the cabinets are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: S. Graves

customer_reviews.title: I did like the storage and the wheels.
customer_reviews.text: This island was not bad to put together. The structure is sturdy and strong. I really like it but I do not like the stainless top at all! It came scratched and warped. It has lumps it it so if you set something round on it, it rolls off. Very thin stainless steel. Would never buy it with stainless steel. We're going to have to get a granite top or a Corian top for it. More money to spend on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost a 5!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking piece of furniture and very sturdy, but the drawers seem loose in the track and sometimes get caught pulling them out. This makes my rating a 4 1/2 but I rounded up to 5 since I found no other major flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Guitarman14

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Yeah my mom loves this thing. She actually was trying to get me to find my bedroom decor from this company because it was so easy to put together. The wheels have a lock that stays perfectly still, and the stainless steel is nice and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for housewarming gift for my daughter. It arrived on time with all the pieces and she assembled it by herself in one evening. Very sturdy and useful for her food prepping. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Cart
customer_reviews.text: Using it as a bar. Didn't like the Natural Wood Top (Butcher Block), but called Crosley and was able to order a black marble top that was here in a week. Cost about the same as ordering it from Amazon with the black top in the first place. Love the cart, makes a great bar, as the shelves adjust to give plenty of room for bottles on one shelf and glasses on the other. Takes a while to put it all together, but definitely worth it once it is done.
customer_reviews.author: Bob32927

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Functional Cart
customer_reviews.text: Although the finished cabinet looks very good, it is made of manufactured wood. The outside may or may not be a veneer (not sure). I am tired of so much of the new furniture being made of pressed wood! Nevertheless, this piece serves our purpose, and we are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Former teacher

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing . Very heavy and had to be delivered by frieght . After putting it together it was not sturdy . Drawers are flimsy going in and out . Large obvious blemish in granite. Too difficult to return . I was looking for a cabinet to give extra storage. Will work ok. Would not recommend if looking for a nice piece of furniture. The blemish in the granite knocks it from 3 stars to 2 .
customer_reviews.author: Jill D.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I put this together in one evening (I’m 62 yo female), it’s perfect for the additional storage space and working surface I needed. I got the granite top and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Tuck

customer_reviews.title: Erector Set Alert
customer_reviews.text: Directions very hard. Was actually incorrectly written and drawn. Finally got through the ordeal so now were happy. But now I am going to sleep off the frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Michael White

customer_reviews.title: Very reasonable and well made
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I kept asking my husband to put it together and he kept putting it off I finally decided to try and do it. And I was able to put together. I am so thankful for more space to prepare my food and it looks fitting in my space
customer_reviews.author: Dinazha

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but faithful.
customer_reviews.text: The Crosley Stainless Steel Top Kitchen is well-priced, stylish, and functional. Sure, it's mostly made of pressboard, the stainless steel surface is just a thin plate of metal atop more pressboard, the paint arrives with the odd ding or chip, the metal scratches like a DJ, and the wheel brakes totally suck, but here's the bottom line: it's endured our abuse for nearly three years now, has served faithfully as a kitchen island and a bar, and when the time comes to eventually get rid of it, we'll probably still be able to flip it for $100. I'll probably even miss it. I can't say that about any piece of IKEA furniture I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rea

customer_reviews.title: Lesser quality product, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Low quality materials but they did send us a replacement part no charge. It will work but I wish it were a little nicer quality. The top is decently tough.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: unit is manufsctured wood save the cabinet doors
customer_reviews.text: this was the best value we could find for a cart that matched our dining room table and hutch. we have open floorplan and wanted a coffee and tea cart.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Renewedman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap build, unrefined, and contains lead
customer_reviews.text: The kitchen island material has a feel of being extremely cheap. The granite top is not well finished, and after cleaning many times, it keep staining. Looks like the black granite is a painted version of the gray one. The paint contains lead, which has been banned from paints in the us, and have a really strong smell. It's been 3 days we mounted it, and left it open, and it still smells. The front also has the wood cover coming off, not great for a fresh built item
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Mine went through a pretty rugged move already
customer_reviews.text: As many reviewers have said... assembly is a bit delicate (but it's a complex piece of furniture), but it's very well built, and very solid. You probably want to glue the dowels, as you are assembling it, however, to help rigidify it and support the weight of the marble top. Mine went through a pretty rugged move already, and is still solid and nice as day 1.
customer_reviews.author: Yann Landrin-schweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Still an excellent piece even with the issues
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, had some scuff marks and one of the drawer pieces was broken when it arrived. Customer service gave me a discount on it because of that and my husband was able to repair the piece. Still an excellent piece even with the issues. I use it in a skin services business.
customer_reviews.author: Amber A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kitchen island for my brother and sister in law or a house warming gift. They absolutely love it . Their kitchen galley style, but wide. It fits beautifully with the colors of the kitchen and provides the added storage they needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Judware

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and pretty.  Large for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am really excited about my purchase. It was easy to put together but took some hrs to get it done. Can't wait to get the kitchen floors finished to complete the project
customer_reviews.author: Robot

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved my new kitchen island
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved my new kitchen island. I put it together on my own while taking care my two babies. It took me 3-4 hours to put together. The only thing I wish different in this kitchen island is if tires were rubber tires. We just got new hard wood floors and Ofcours it made marks on my floor which my husband wasn't to happy about. The smell didn't even bother me at all. It just smelled like new furniture. And that's how it suppose to smell. I definitely recommend people to buy this beautiful piece of furniture for your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena

customer_reviews.title: Generally pleased with product quality and appearance
customer_reviews.text: Generally pleased with product quality and appearance. Two downsides: 1) There is a strong chemical smell--like a cleaning fluid--inside the cabinet. Assume this is from coating materials, and hope the smell goes away soon. 2) Once doors are installed, size of shelf opening about an inch smaller than size of shelves described in the on-line description. Hence unable to store Cusinart and Crock Pot inside the cabinet as originally planned since I'm using larger middle cabinet for my KitchenAid mixer, which does fit in. Arrived in good shape, and assembly instructions good.
customer_reviews.author: MZee

customer_reviews.title: Luv it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very nice well made island especially for the cost! Storage capacity is great! I like the paper towel holder much more than I thought I would. The color is more off white but still works fine with my white cabinets. There was a large safety sticker on the back that was hard to remove and pulled the paint off. However I took the drawer to Home Depot, they matched the paint and it covered it perfectly. Overall, love it and would highly recommend it. Attached is a picture so you can see the back of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Definitely helps to have two people for assembly. Took us an afternoon to put it together. We are very pleased with the quality. Matches well with our current kitchen cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferN24

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sturdy piece of furniture. Okay, space wise. I did replace the wheels almost immediately with sturdier rubber wheels with a good locking mechanism. Now that I have had it a while I wish I had purchased the granite or stainless top. The natural wood is not finished and I worry about having meat on it, even on a chopping board. I will probably change it out soon.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Bug

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I'm simply amazed by its beauty! It took about two hours to put together. The instructions are easy to follow. You will need assistance putting the top on. Lovely product. Fast shipping. I use it for canned goods and pantry items. I left off the spice and towel rack due to space constraints. The black granite is beautiful. You will need to pry the wooden crate holding it open. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: S. King

customer_reviews.title: Just Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This Kitchen island Has a rich color, lots of room, I just love it looks much better in person than in the picture, Very pleased with this purchased
customer_reviews.author: Susan Butler

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kitchen Cart for the price
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen cart was the right size and the right color for our needs and the best thing of all was the price. The package came via FedEx Ground and was delivered in good condition to our front door. My wife and I put it together in just over an hour with little or no trouble. We have put together other furniture items so we have some experience with these items. We LOVE The black Granite top.
customer_reviews.author: fedexbicman

customer_reviews.title: Missing Hardware
customer_reviews.text: I just received my cart and it's missing all the hardware. I have the wheels, but nothing else. Who can I contact to get just the hardware sent? UPDATING THIS: wow, great customer service. Got on chat with Crosley and they were very helpful. The cart is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Lynn Sferrella

customer_reviews.title: Moderate assembly difficulty but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, but I still love it. It did have a weird smell for a while, but overall it dissipated and came around. I didn't install it with wheels because I didn't need to move it around. It took an hour or two to install with my wife and after a few curse words we managed. She loves it and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: decent build quality
customer_reviews.text: Went together easily. Instructions were clear and concise. Took approximately 1.5 hours to build. Drawers and doors open nicely and all gaps are even. The reason I give this product a "3" is the warning labels applied to the rear of the island (component "d"") removed the paint to the bare substrate when the stickers were removed. I ended up having to sand and refinish this piece to make the island presentable when place in the center of a room.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: poor quality. came in chipped here and there
customer_reviews.text: poor quality and smaller than I thought.. it seems like a toy/play cart. quality not so good. wooden panel broke at the corner while I was assemblying it. but just keeping it due to too much hassle. should have just bought at the store paying a $100 dollars more. will not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tae yun

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: very nice piece and easy to put together with simple to follow instructions. We needed (wanted) a bar also, so I looked for one by this company. Only reason for not giving all 5 stars was the cabinet would be more convenient if it were divided into two compartments instead of three, unless that is what you desire.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control needed And Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and pretty cabinet. However we found a big chip in the wood on the front of the cabinet, a chip on the drawer, and the stainless steel top is scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Nice is island.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful island but it did off gas the cherry stain smell for quite awhile. If you are sensitive to that you may want to choose another finish. Was packed well, arrived without any damage and was medium skill level to put together. My husband loves it and it looks nice against wall or in center of kitchen as back is finished to match.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Functional and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved to a house that had a smaller kitchen than what we are used to. We needed extra storage and counter space. The kitchen island is perfect and it matches our kitchen cabinets. Fairly easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Norman D Amstutz

customer_reviews.title: So Well made and Lots of Storage
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend who had absolutely no kitchen storage space. She is so pleased with it. It is very sturdy and looks high quality. She fit so much in it. And it really makes the kitchen look so much nicer!
customer_reviews.author: JLTO

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Matches my kitchen cabinets perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to put this together by myself for the most part except for a little help turning it right side up and putting the granite top on the top of it. The instructions were great also. It is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: ruthdm1046

customer_reviews.title: I really like this island
customer_reviews.text: Great island for the price. 2 drawers, good storage and the top is great too.
customer_reviews.author: ButteLady

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of the kitchen island. However, we had a few defective parts which we discovered as we were putting it together. Crosley was very prompt with replacement parts, but it was over the holidays and disappointing to not be able to use it. Some of the pieces also do not fit snugly against each other, with visible gaps. For the price, I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Vomastic

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Piece!
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly beautiful piece. It did take hubby about 2/3 hours to assemble, but the finished product is amazing! High quality, real wood - everything went together perfectly. There is a lot of packaging, but that is what keeps it in tip top shape upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My father and I put it together in less than an hour and when together it is really a nice looking and functioning piece
customer_reviews.text: Well made, time consuming to put together, but if you work on it as a two man team, you can git 'er done! My father and I put it together in less than an hour and when together it is really a nice looking and functioning piece. It's nice that the pieces are lettered and can be identified easy with the instructions, made the assembly go very smooth
customer_reviews.author: Titan Art 6

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to the kitchen. I use this for my trash plus it has plenty of extra room for other items. Nice design and pretty good quality. Nice to have the extra counter space as well. And I like the fact that I can roll it out of the way if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: beautiful design, ample storage and were very easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these to fill our large kitchen, beautiful design, ample storage and were very easy to put together. The fact they are on rollers makes it very easy to utilize them for different needs based on who we are entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but steel is warped
customer_reviews.text: Steel top is a little floppy not solid almost warped but over all great cart
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Natal

customer_reviews.title: If the cabinet had been in good shape I would give it more stars
customer_reviews.text: If the cabinet had been in good shape I would give it more stars. The top has several scratches and the back panel was split at the top. I love the look added my own knobs also the instructions are very bad. What a shame otherwise the cabinet design is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: J.  MAYER

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it ...gave me the counter space that I need it,good quality,good size ,just perfect
customer_reviews.author: ana ocampo

customer_reviews.title: If your standard is low you will love it.
customer_reviews.text: The center piece dividing the doors on the right side had a huge dent in it. The Stainless steel top had a dent in the corner. The drawer facing came off. The doors are not even, the right side is lower than the left using the holes they drilled. The shipping box was not damaged so I assume it was negligent quality control.This unit was not fit for sale. I had to do a lot of extra work to try to get it to look minimally acceptable. Overall you get what you pay for cheap Chinese junk. If your standard is low you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Janis C.

customer_reviews.title: Do not order this item
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if my issue is with the manufacturer or the shipping company but i had to wait 4 weeks for the cabinet to show up after the granite top. The granite top, once open, was cracked right down the middle and in 2 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: R S Peters

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this for extra storage. It was delivered by a large truck, so I had it delivered to my work so the truck would be able to turn around.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: I would order from this company again!
customer_reviews.text: This item is great! Much nicer than I expected. Of course it took longer to arrive than a traditional prime shipment but I knew that when I ordered since it was shipped to someone local then delivered to me. The quality was amaxing. Although I don't need a second island like this I would order again from Crosley. My husband put it together easily. The locking casters are sturdy. The drawer slides and great.
customer_reviews.author: Lucile Arnusch

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this cart!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cart. Yes there is a "new" smell to it when first unpacked. It takes a few days to air out. I put this together by myself in about 2 hours with a just a screwdriver and the supplied allen wrench. I'm a 50+ year old woman with no assembly experience but it was so easy. I'm very impressed with the way all the doors, drawers and shelves line up. Its very sturdy and stable unlike some I've seen in the local big box stores. I would definitely recommend this cart to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: G.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful addition to my dinning room
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful addition to my dinning room. I have my microwave on it and alternate between the crock pot and the food saver on the other side. I like the wheels it makes for easy cleaning under it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the effort!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous feature worthy piece! It came in a gazillion pieces but we took our time and it paid off. 3 hours to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: A. Preston

customer_reviews.title: It is heavy
customer_reviews.text: Everything came and was very easy to put together only took me one hour and I love how it all came together.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Our first delivery arrived broken..luckily the pickup and redelivery was much better. The assembly took my husband about 3hrs. He hit a 1 or 2 snags but besides that he got the job done. It fits perfectly in our kitchen and holds plenty of items.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Looks ok but not great. Storage areas are divided into sections that are too small to be of much use. Assembly took longer than it should have because glue blocks on two panels had been dislodged during shipment and had to be reglued. Top and wheels are the best things about this product. The rest of the unit is of such poor quality that it seems way overpriced compared with other furniture I have assembled.
customer_reviews.author: MTU67

customer_reviews.title: Love This Cart!!
customer_reviews.text: This cart was very well packaged and came with instructions that were very easy to follow. It took about two hours for my partner to put it together, and believe me, I was no help. It is very sturdy and attractive, and suits my needs. I have a very large mixer on it, so was a little worried about whether or not it would wobble while it was running, but it was fine. I'm very happy with the seller and the cart.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly what I wanted for my space
customer_reviews.text: I have a small-ish kitchen and this piece is very functional and helped free up a lot of space in my cabinets. It took a few hours to put together but it was mostly pretty easy to assemble. The hardware/magnets were the most frustrating part. I'm super happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: April Burke

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck, a great piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for added counter space, drawer and cabinet space. All pieces went together flawlessly, although it took 2&1/2 hours to assemble, matched my cabinets and hardware perfectly. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Vaught Moody

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. However, a lot of DIY.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the end product after it was completed . It was a lot of work putting together and the instructions wasn’t clear in some spots...
customer_reviews.author: Becky D.

customer_reviews.title: first unit was damaged but amazon was terrific with regard to replacement and return
customer_reviews.text: first unit was damaged but amazon was terrific with regard to replacement and return. second unit arrived undamaged and assembled without a problem. color match was perfect and it is meeting all our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flat pack furniture... Ugh.
customer_reviews.text: This is so close to being such a decent product. It will suit my needs after adding angle brackets myself, but the assembly process they provide (specifically, installing the bottom while two of the pieces are just flopping around on dowel rods) results in more frustration than $350 is worth. EDIT: I'm dropping this thing to one star. The bottom piece is so warped, that I've had to add my own wood-screws to keep this thing together. I'm sure they'd send me a new piece, but I'm done wasting my time. We'll use it until it falls over, and then throw it in the trash where it belongs. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: MJW

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: 1 person could put this together in about 2 hrs. I needed a crow bar (Yes really) to get the Granite top out of its wooded crate. The only part I needed a second person was to help lifting and fitting the granite top on. I would call this an excellent buy and fit for my needs (Cart for my baking supplies and extra counter space)
customer_reviews.author: Insert name here

product_meta.title: Crosley Furniture Rolling Kitchen Island with Solid Grey Granite Top, White
product_meta.description: Color:White| Style Name:Solid Grey Granite TopConstructed of solid hardwood and wood veneers, this mobile kitchen cart by Crosley Furniture is designed for longevity. The beautiful raised panel doors and drawer fronts provide the ultimate in style to dress up your kitchen. Two deep drawers are great for anything from utensils to storage containers. Behind the four doors, you will find adjustable shelves and an abundance of storage space for things that you prefer to be out of sight. The heavy duty casters provide the ultimate in mobility. When the cabinet is where you want it, simply engage the locking casters to prevent movement. Style, function, and quality make this mobile kitchen cart a wise addition to your home.
feature_bullets: The solid grey granite top is built to last for years to come
The hand rubbed, multi-step finish is perfect for blending with any décor
Beautiful raised panel doors and brushed nickel hardware adds style to your kitchen
Spacious drawers are great for anything from utensils to storage containers
Includes adjustable shelves for an abundance of customizable storage space

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars583 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
